casebody.data:
No. 10-416. Jesse Jay Montejo, Petitioner v. Louisiana. 562 U.S. 1082, 131 S. Ct. 656, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9104.

178 L. Ed. 2d 513,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Louisiana denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 40 So. 3d 952.
